definitions.definition: Something additional , such as an item above and beyond the ordinary school curriculum , or added to the usual charge on a bill .
An extra edition of a newspaper , which is printed outside of the normal printing cycle, for example to report an important late-breaking event.
examples: Extra , extra ! Read all about it!

definitions.definition: A run scored without the ball having hit the striker 's bat - a wide , bye , leg bye or no ball .
A supernumerary or walk-on in a film or play.
The state or trait of being over the top , of behaving in an overly dramatic manner.
examples: Stop! I can't deal with all your extra today!

definitions.definition: Something of an extra quality or grade. (Can we add an example for this sense?)
A day of extra duties (often, over the weekends) in camp, as a form of punishment . Used in the phrase “to sign extra”, meaning one has been assigned extras as punishment .

main_definition: Something additional , such as an item above and beyond the ordinary school curriculum , or added to the usual charge on a bill .
secondary_definitions: An extra edition of a newspaper , which is printed outside of the normal printing cycle, for example to report an important late-breaking event.
( cricket ) A run scored without the ball having hit the striker 's bat - a wide , bye , leg bye or no ball .
( acting ) A supernumerary or walk-on in a film or play.
( slang ) The state or trait of being over the top , of behaving in an overly dramatic manner.
Something of an extra quality or grade. (Can we add an example for this sense?)

( Singapore , military , countable ) A day of extra duties (often, over the weekends) in camp, as a form of punishment . Used in the phrase “to sign extra”, meaning one has been assigned extras as punishment .
